medical_history.chief_complaint: Progressive leg stiffness and gait unsteadiness.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 1 year ago and progressed over this duration. There were no other symptoms of celiac disease, and the patient did not adhere to a gluten-free diet.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Biopsy-proven celiac disease presenting with dermatitis herpetiformis in 1980. History of iron-deficiency anemia and vitamin B12 deficiency requiring replacement therapy.
medical_history.family_history: Two of five siblings have celiac disease without neurologic symptoms.
